title: Peanut butter and banana bars
ingredients: ['85g peanut butter', '75g dark brown soft sugar', '35g unsalted butter', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ripe banana, mashed', '50g porridge oats', '5 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons wheatgerm', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda']
